requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i3-10100 or higher, for AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
